Bulb vases: Cut off the top of the bulb and use the hollowed-out shell as a unique and eco-friendly vase for flowers.
Bulb ornaments: Fill bulbs with glitter, small trinkets, or paint to create one-of-a-kind ornaments for the holidays.
Bulb candle holders: Melt wax and insert a wick into a hollowed-out bulb to make a charming candle holder.
Bulb bird feeders: Use bulbs as small bird feeders by filling them with birdseed and hanging them outside.

Can planters: Use clean, empty cans as planters for small herbs and flowers, or create a hanging garden by stringing cans together.
Can telephones: Connect two cans with a taut string to create a fun, old-fashioned communication system for kids.
Can organizers: Use cans to store and organize pens, pencils, and other office supplies on your desk.
Can bird feeders: Fill clean, empty cans with birdseed and hang them in your yard to attract and feed local birds.
